Project to build a collection of Node.js apps.
Creates project folders and defines some high level variables.

Setup Node instance + support 
-express
-fs
-bodyParser

Set corsOrigin to your server url to allow api access.
Calls sudo forever stop to stop node process
Build and execute acme-client to retrieve cert, key & ca from letsencrypt. This will allow encrypted and ca verified https communication.

. 
Only challenge type 'http-01' is implemented.

c.email must be your valid email
c.commitment must be either staging (to not apply changes) or production (to apply changes)

This component will communicate with Let's Encrypt API and create  -> delete a 'challenge' file in the static folder.
Ensure this server has http port 80 open and publicly reachable via  <%a.hostName%>  and not redirecting when building. 
3 files are generated;
/home/%a.systemUser%/.ssl/%a.hostName%.key  
/home/%a.systemUser%/.ssl/%a.hostName%.cert
/home/%a.systemUser%/.ssl/%a.hostName%.csr 

After the files are generated you can enable https and redirect http to https. Restart any other servers that depend on these certs.

5fe98cc8-6335-463d-b969-e8d1f7f7d74a.name: Mount S3 bucket on amazon-linux EC2 instance

ops.insert: Installs s3fs-fuse on aws linux and mounts S3 bucket.

Ensure the S3 role has been applied to this instance.
See;
: The name of the s3 access role you created in AWS iam.
: The url corresponding to the region of the bucket.
: The folder to place the s3 file system.
: The name of your bucket you created in s3

insertHTML.value: Design and manage your web infrastructure and applications in one easy to use tool. ezStack Builder connects to other servers and automatically configures all the tricky bits so that web development can be easy. You can start being creative immediately.
The easiest way to mange your on-line presence and develop custom applications independently. Plug and play with the coolest technologies on your personal web server.

A service to provide a tunneling http/s proxy.
Configure your browser to use http & https proxy via this system.
Ensure that this system's firewall only allows your IP to access the listen_port.

serviceEndPointName 	- Default contactSend
authuser 				- Mail service login name. Eg. me@provider.net
authpass 			- Mail service password
mailhost 				- Mail service host name. Eg. mail.provider.net
mailport 				- Default 587
sendTo 				- Mail account to send to. Eg. me@provider.net
sendFrom 			- The from address. Eg. My Profile <me@provider.net>
subject 				- Any text to appear in subject line.

insertHTML.value: See my LinkedIn profile for more career details.

Regardless of the role, I solve information problems with an analytical touch. I support the business by providing solutions that are open, flexible, appropriate, intuitive and productive. Regardless of whether I was leading IT initiatives for large corporations or being a solo application developer I always put the customer first.
I love to meet people in my home town of Calgary and talk about technology and I'd love to hear what you are doing. Please contact me if you have any questions, opportunities, or comments.

Hello! I am a husband and father of three with a profound interest in computer technology. In my 20+ years as an IT professional, I was fortunate to have achievements in almost every segment of the IT world. I have tied together my experiences in programming, support, testing, analysis, and management into a skill-set that can even impress my kids.
• Founder and full stack developer of a Free Open Source Startup. ezStack - A personal configuration manager that was used to easily design, develop and deploy this web site.

• Racked up 23 years of great experiences in IBM with wins in product support, software architecture and development, application testing, project support and management, DevOps and automation, plus many other roles.
• Worked with and learned from many corporate IT organizations including; IBM Canada, ATB, Shell Canada, Alberta Gov, Enbridge, Cooperators Ins, Suncor, Telus, and more.
• Officially recognized for concept and creation of online automated release management information portal for IBM/Enbridge.

• Learning new tech. In IT nothing stands still. New technologies appear everyday. Watching tech news, hearing about other peoples experiences and keeping an open mind will spawn that big idea in the future.
• Very high-level application development. This was one of the reasons I created ezStack Builder. Anyone can be creative if they have the right tools at their finger tips.
• Configuration management. Automation + SSH + Cloud api = efficient and intuitive systems creation and management. Don't ask IT to build. Ask IT to allow you to build
• Founder, designer and developer of a free open source personal configuration manager. Allows anyone to design, develop, and deploy web applications.
• Techs in use: Node.js, Express, SSH, HTML5, CSS, AWS API, rest api, headless chrome
• Project support roles: Release management, project coordinator, Project data analyst. (Enbridge, Suncor)
• DevOps: Implemented successful strategies to shorten and strengthen SDLC. Tech Used: Java, Tomcat, DB2, Rational Team Concert. (Alberta Gov/Enbridge/Shell)
• Developer of many business specific software products for IBM, AB Gov, Shell, Enbridge, Suncore, ATB. Techs in use: JS, Java, Websphere, Lotus Domino, Dojo, perl
• Built top-shelf.net to host web profiles for free (like this one) for anyone in the Calgary community who needs one.

Service to provide a reverse http proxy.
Uses
- Set to URL of target server to be proxied. Eg 'http://some-server.com:8080' or most likely 'http://127.0.0.1:8080' if wp and node are installed on the same server.
- Set to the request path that will be proxied. Eg '/blog'
- Set to the rewritten path on the proxied server . Eg '/' if WordPress was installed in the root or '/wpblog/' if WordPress was installed in /wpblog

Add proxy settings to wp-config.php.
HTTPS - Set to on or off depending if proxy host is https or not.
HTTP_HOST - Set to IP or host name of proxy host. Eg www.mypage.com
WP_HOME - Set to url and path of proxy root. Eg
- Set to url and path of proxy root. Eg

/wpblog
REQUEST_URI - Set to convert admin url to proxied url. Eg /wpblog/wp-admin/

The main row to hold the sections.
class="section main-section"

insertHTML.value: Build rich web environments for your self or for others. Design complex self-hosted web apps using an intuitive & fun UI. Adding functionality is as easy as dropping in a new component. It`s your web server. You can be as creative as you want and there are no limits on what you can build.
ezStack Builder's features are out of this world
ezStack Builder is self hosted so you have control and authority over your content.
You do not need to sign up to ezStack to use Builder.
You can take advantage of convenient and inexpensive cloud servers. Amazon AWS hosting starts at less than $2.00/month.
The web apps that you build are yours to keep or share.

ezStack Builder provides a high level user interface to complex web infrastructure and code. You and only you possess the admin credentials to your server. You are the boss. Being a full-stack developer has never been easier and the apps that you build are 100% yours. Being able to set the firewall means that you can be certain that your privacy is ensured.

You have the freedom to host ezStack Builder and your web applications anywhere. If you do not have your own server you can take advantage of very inexpensive cloud servers from Amazon or other cloud providers.

Easy host: Yes we can host ezStack Builder and your web apps for you. (coming soon) We can spin up your private servers in our infrastructure and when you decide it's time for independence the transition will be seamless.

Cloud host: If you are not a developer but still want complete independence then you can take advantage of inexpensive cloud servers. ezStack Builder includes cloud specific components to make your life easy.
Self host: You can install ezStack Builder on your own server to take advantage of the incredible software stack management abilities while being completely independent.
ezStack Builder includes hundreds of components you can arrange into a unique and beautiful and functional website. No plugins or templates required.

---All routes below require authentication---

c.secret = Any long random alpha-numeric string at least 20 chrs.
c.password = The password to log in with. 
c.prefix = This prefix will be pretended to all secure service endpoints. (Should be '/' followed by short random alpha-numeric string. eg: '/aple846').  
ID = Admin
Insert login, logout services + ui and Insert point for authenticated services.

Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

Will get a data row and render fields. 
This component supports Quill(tm) inputs. Populate fields with the ids of text inputs separated by comma. 
Specify quill input id in quillObj. 
DataGetServiceEndPointName is the unique service name that you choose.

quillGetHTML(quillDelta) will return html 
stripHtml(source) will return text of specified number of characters from html source.

Will insert current date (toDateString) into value of specified input id
eg; insertDate("dateInput")

Will clear specified inputs/quill. 
Eg clearThings("f1;f2;f3")

b654e274-f174-46b6-b753-d6051c38afe2.name: Set Maria & httpd to start automatically

ops.insert:
Install Wordpress from wordpress.org
Warning this is a destructive install. Ensure you have a backup if required.

Sets root pw, creates user & pw, secures db, creates wp-config.php.
Warning! The wordpress-user & database will be dropped if they exist.

wordpress-user - The user name for  wordpress functions. Eg wpuser
DatabaseName - The name of the database. Eg wpdatabase
root-password - The user password.
user-password - The root password.

Navigate to WordPress admin and populate launch link.
Note that the launch urls in this component will be incorrect if proxy is enabled for WordPress.
